data.oai_dc:dc: Backcross family (F1 female x G. pennsylvanicus male) - JoinMap Format and SNPs

Tab 1: Genotype data for all mapped individuals at all loci not excluded due to lack of sequence data. Data is presented in the format used by JoinMap 4.1 in which <nnxnp> represent loci in which the father is homozygote and the F1 mother is heterozygote and <hkxhk> represent loci in which both parents are heterozygotes. Tab 2: Same data in raw SNP format including mother (F1) and father (G. pennsylvanicus) information.
